member.name: M:CoSurfer.Browser.OnDocumentComplete(System.Object,System.Object@)
member.summary: This event handler is called for two events - 'NavigateComplete' and 'DocumentComplete' because the treatment of both events is the same.

member.name: P:CoSurfer.Browser.Document
member.summary: This property returns the internal IHTMLDocument2 interface of the BrowserControl. If something is wrong ( _browser not initialized, BrowserControl is busy or the document itself is not complete/interactive) it returns null.

member.name: P:CoSurfer.Browser.Busy
member.summary: This property returns the busy state of this WebBrowser control
